basics.name: Tristen Hogue
basics.label: Support Engineer at PandoLogic
basics.summary: Highly-motivated Support Engineer with years of experience providing Tier 3 Support and Solutions Engineering for complex enterprise systems, including Unifi Networking equipment, Kubernetes, TrueNAS, and Docker. Adept at utilizing scripting languages, automation tools, and monitoring tools to ensure maximum uptime and optimal customer experience. Proven track record of successfully resolving customer issues, troubleshooting complex technical problems, and developing innovative solutions. Skilled in network engineering, scripting, automation, and customer service. Experienced in deploying and managing Windows and Linux servers, NAS storage, and virtualization technologies. Successfully manage multiple concurrent projects, prioritize tasks, and ensure the highest quality of service. Track record of success in driving customer satisfaction, improving operational efficiency, and deploying new products and services.

about.value: I am a self-taught full-stack developer
In my free time I enjoy working on my homelab, playing video games, and aviation
I like to learn new skills and am always looking for new challenges

work.name: Veritone
work.summary:
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including developers and product managers, to address customer needs and improve overall system.

- Identify, diagnose, and resolve system bugs and outages in timely & accurate manner, minimizing downtime & maximizing customer satisfaction.

- Lead communication efforts during ongoing incidents, ensuring internal customers are kept informed and equipped to address client questions.

- Acquire & document comprehensive technical knowledge of company products and services to provide accurate and efficient support to clients.

- Deliver high-quality service to clients by promptly and effectively responding to inquiries and resolving technical issues via email, Slack, and the ticketing system.

- Maintain a high level of awareness of upcoming releases and current trends in the tech space, implementing preventive measures to mitigate potential issues.

work.name: Pandologic (a Veritone Company)
work.summary:
- Develop and implement IT policies, procedures, and best practices to enhance operational efficiency, security, and compliance.
- Provide advanced technical support and troubleshooting for complex system issues, serving as the highest level of escalation for critical incidents.
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to develop and implement strategic plans, aligning technology initiatives with business goals & objectives.

work.name: Pandologic (a Veritone Company)
work.summary:
- Optimize operational processes and procedures for maximum efficiency while maintaining campaign quality standards.
- Assisting with the implementation of new processes and procedures.
- Identify potential technical problems on a clients campaign and resolve them quickly
- Maintain policy and procedure documents.

work.name: ZipRecruiter
work.summary:
- Work closely with internal customers to ensure all new clients' needs are addressed prior to sale
- Provide detailed specifications for proposed solutions including time and scope involved
- Analyze current technologies used within the company and develop steps and processes to improve
- Account for possible project challenges or constraints and proactively seek to manage challenges

work.name: ZipRecruiter
work.summary:
- Manage enterprise performance marketing recruitment campaigns
- Provide strategic support to sales representatives
- Identify key areas of campaign improvement
- Conduct quarterly business reviews
- Ensure campaign success by tracking KPI's and analyzing campaign data

work.name: BizIQ - Small Business Marketing
work.summary:
❖ Spearheaded the implementation of new protocols and an enhanced quality assurance process.

❖ Reduced cancelation rates by 10% within the first 90 days of being promoted to supervisor.

▪ Reported to Director of Marketing and company owners; supervised Paid Media Account Managers.

▪ Facilitated the optimization of Google, Facebook, and Bing Ads campaigns alongside team members, other paid search solutions and the management of social media campaigns.

▪ Responsible for onboarding new clients, following up regularly, and retaining existing account revenue.

▪ Established weekly, monthly, and quarterly objectives with the goal of longterm department growth.

▪ Frequently evaluated on metrics such as cancel rates, QA issue percentages, and follow-up reach percentages.

certificates.name: Design the Web: Graphics and CSS Pseudo-Elements

references.name: Eric King
references.reference: Tristen is the type of employee that any manager would be extremely grateful to have on their team. He takes action to improve without needing to be directed, and is always willing to help other team members. His work ethic and efficiency is of the highest caliber, as is his ability to handle clients and their needs. I have worked with Tristen for over a year and would recommend him to any team in need of an extremely driven individual.
